bug.author: pezzivic
bug.description: after installing ciphey on macOS 10.15.6 with python3 v3.7.3, I tried to run it and got the following error Pez-MacBook-Pro:~ pez$ ciphey Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/bin/ciphey", line 5, in from ciphey.ciphey import main File "/Library/Python/3.7/site-packages/ciphey/init.py", line 1, in from . import common File "/Library/Python/3.7/site-packages/ciphey/common.py", line 5, in import cipheycore File "/Library/Python/3.7/site-packages/cipheycore/init.py", line 13, in from . import _ciphey_core_py ImportError: dlopen(/Library/Python/3.7/site-packages/cipheycore/_ciphey_core_py.so, 2): Library not loaded: /usr/local/opt/python@3.7/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/Python Referenced from: /Library/Python/3.7/site-packages/cipheycore/_ciphey_core_py.so Reason: image not found

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.85. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Closing this because you didn't fill out the issue template and this is a duplicate issue. The documentation (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/wiki/Common-Issues-&-Their-Solutions>https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/wiki/Common-Issues-&-Their-Solutions</denchmark-link> ) lists this problem with Mac OS, and the solution is to install Docker and run Ciphey with it.
